frontend.usageNotes: Shows contact info (email/location/social links) + a contact form (name/email/message) with snackbar feedback.

backend.notes: Backend route must accept form payload and store/send message. This endpoint is called by ContactPage.jsx.

integrationSteps: Ensure ContactPage is routed in the portfolio router/nav.
Make sure VITE_BACKEND_API is set and CORS allows frontend origin.
